heroSubtitle: An epic journey into the heart of darkness
Testo1: 'Not' MINI Crawler is a strategic fantasy game where every decision can mean glory... or ruin.
Testo2: Create your own hero, explore procedurally generated dungeons, battle with a dynamic card system, and uncover ancient secrets in a world shrouded in mystery.
Testo3: Every adventure is unique. Every step can change your destiny.
Testo4: Unique procedurally generated dungeons with mysterious events and hidden paths
Testo5: Turn-based system that influences every fight, decision, and character development.
Testo6: Every hero is different: you can create one with unique abilities or discover random ones.
newsletterDesc: Sign up to get beta keys, updates and news.

free.label: Free
free.description: Start your journey for free, no commitment.

premium.label: Premium
premium.description: Unleash your hero's full potential with Premium.
